column4: that is awesome news!! the other question I have is if I install the server ubuntu will it have the full unix command set? I mean like nano, pine, etc... and not use this thing called a "busy box"?
It doesn't use busybox, but some utilities have to be installed with aptitude
It depends if you do a default server or truly minimal (JeOS) install
I think the default server install includes nano and stuff
